name: Human Made Machine
description:
You are awoke in a strange castle and don't remember anything.

A short horror game with cheap jumpscare(s).

Made with Godot for Godot Wild Jam 46

This is also my first 3D Game (٩(◕‿◕｡)۶)

If any bug occurs just press the "R" to reload the scene.

Theme : Orb

Wildcard(s) : Fear of the Dark

WARNING!

I hope you don't have claustrophobia
